mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents, photo) values(#{boardDTO.boardWriter}, #{boardDTO.boardPass}, #{boardDTO.boardTitle}, #{boardDTO.boardContents}, #{imagePath})
mapper.select: select * from board_table order by id desc
mapper.update: update board_table set boardHits=boardHits+1 where id=#{id}
update board_table set boardTitle=#{boardTitle}, boardContents=#{boardContents} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE(boardCreatedTime) as diaryDate, COUNT(*) > 0 as diaryExists FROM board_table WHERE YEAR(boardCreatedTime) = #{year} AND MONTH(boardCreatedTime) = #{month} GROUP BY DATE(boardCreatedTime) ORDER BY diaryDate
